alert.note: Alert for Perry; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:23AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Perry, northern Garland, northwestern Saline and southeastern Yell Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 723 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Plainview in Yell County, or 18 miles south of Danville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ola... Casa... Aplin... Birta... Carter Cove Park... Nimrod... Long Mountain... Deberrie... Fourche Junction... Hollis... Garden Point Recreation Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
